divs: sighting detailsi was watching the news channel kvoa ch 4 tucson with a femail roomate regarding a ufo event on film a few days prior. at that moment her friend came inside and said you need to come outside and see this. when i went outside i seen an obect , a light in the sky, nw of my address and i then ran to get my camera and i captured this very breif vid . i was rushing to get find the night application for the sony camera when i found this video....please let me know 1. the distance from the camrea and 2. the size of the object please. thank you [name deleted\cms\tg]
